category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_create_supersedure
preference.preference_description: Activates the "Create Supersedure" performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the beginning of the operation to the display of the supersedure. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the "Create Supersedure" performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the "Create Supersedure" performance transaction.
